Description: Available September 5th Renovated 2 bed 1 bath apartment in Revere! Now offering this second floor, two bedroom, one bath apartment in Revere. This is a second floor is soaked in natural sunlight from all the windows surrounding the kitchen. Every room has gleaming hardwood floors and closet space. Renovated bathroom, Laundry in unit, as well as 2 off street parking spots! Incredible views from the bedrooms, contact me for the video tour! Pets are negotiable.
